subject: Investing
title: Multi-Signature Wallets
description: Learn Multi-Signature Wallets in one minute.

hook.text: A $100 million DAO treasury requires three out of five keyholders to approve any transaction.

buildup.text: Multi-signature wallets need multiple private keys to authorize a transaction, not just one.

discovery.text: A 2-of-3 setup means any two of three keyholders must sign. One lost key doesn't lock you out.

twist.text: Multi-sig protects against single points of failureâ€”hacks, rogue insiders, and lost devices.

climax.text: For large holdings, a multi-sig setup with keys in different locations is the gold standard of security.

punchline.text: One key is a risk. Multiple keys are a fortress.

quiz.question: What does a 2-of-3 multi-sig wallet require?
options: Two of three keyholders to sign a transaction
